articles.description: Australia bowl India out for 155 in the fourth Test to take a 2-1 lead in the series with one match remaining.
articles.title: Australia v India: Hosts take series lead with win in Melbourne

articles.description: Referees will announce any video assistant referee decisions to fans inside stadiums for the first time during the upcoming Carabao Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: Carabao Cup: Referees to announce VAR decisions to crowd in Arsenal-Newcastle and Spurs-Liverpool semi-finals

articles.description: Sam Darnold leads the Minnesota Vikings to a crucial win in their pursuit of the NFC top seed and Phildelphia Eagles' Saquon Barkley hits rushing landmark.
articles.title: NFL results & week 17 recap: Sam Darnold stars for Vikings, Saquon Barkley eyes record, Jayden Daniels makes play-offs

articles.description: Liverpool winger Mohamed Salah is 'far away' from signing a new deal at the club.
articles.title: Mohamed Salah 'far away' from signing new Liverpool contract

articles.description: AC Milan sack manager Paulo Fonseca following the draw against Roma in Serie A.
articles.title: AC Milan: Paulo Fonseca sacked as manager after draw against Roma

articles.description: After a long-running feud, Novak Djokovic and Nick Kyrgios developed a bromance and are now celebrating their first win as a doubles pair.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic and Nick Kyrgios win doubles debut at Brisbane International

articles.description: Nathan Aspinall cruises into the PDC World Championship quarter-finals after dramatic wins for Chris Dobey and Callan Rydz.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Nathan Aspinall cruises into quarter-finals

articles.description: Multiple host cities and indoor ceremonies could become a feature of a "more affordable and more attractive" Commonwealth Games in future.
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: Multiple host cities possible for future

articles.description: Euro 2025, the Women's Rugby World Cup, two Ashes series, and a British and Irish Lions tour all feature in the new sporting year.
articles.title: 2025 sporting events calendar: Euro 2025, Ashes series and Lions

articles.description: Wales have injury hooker problems for the Six Nations with injured captain Dewi Lake ruled out until the end of the tournament.
articles.title: Dewi Lake: Wales Six Nations blow as hooker and captain out for up to 12 weeks
